channel.title: Development on If You Care
channel.description: Recent content in Development on If You Care

item.title: Why Im Not Switching to Firefox
item.description: I’ve been very excited with the progress that Firefox has been making in recent times and have been contemplating making the switch from Chrome for a while. The release of Firefox 57 nudged me over the edge and I excitedly downloaded Firefox Developer Edition like I an imaginative child on Christmas morning. I took some time to customize it to my liking and then proceeded to use it as my primary browser over the weekend.
